entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow or periods of ice pellets ending overnight then cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
